page.title: 16FOOD
page.content: Today we have a wide variety of foods. Here is an average daily menu. BREAKFAST:Fruit juice or cereal and milk, egg, bacon, fried bread and fried tomatoes. LUNCH:Sandwiches, crisps and something like an apple or an orange, followed by a drink. TEA:A drink of tea or coffee, with cakes and biscuits. DINNER:Meat with potatoes, carrots, peas or other vegetables, followed by a pudding or sweet of ice_cream with a sweet tasting sauce, then a drink of tea or coffee. Sausages, beefburgers, fishfingers and fish_cakes. These foods are some_ times called 'junk' foods because they are ready processed. Baked beans, spaghetti, invaders, haunted house, noodle doodles and spaghetti rings,are also popular foods in this category.
